com.stormpath.sdk.account

Interface AccountLinkingPolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resource, Saveable

    public interface AccountLinkingPolicy
extends Resource, Saveable
    An AccountLinkingPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of account linking associated with an accountStoreHolder
    Since:
    1.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AutomaticProvisioningStatus getAutomaticProvisioning()
      Returns the automaticProvisioning status of the accountLinkingPolicy for the accountStoreHolder.
      String getMatchingProperty()
      Returns the matchingProperty of the accountLinkingPolicy for the accountStoreHolder.
      AccountLinkingStatus getStatus()
      Returns the status of the accountLinkingPolicy for the accountStoreHolder.
      Tenant getTenant()
      Returns the parent Tenant of the accountStoreHolder associated to this accountLinkingPolicy
      boolean isAccountLinkingEnabled()
      Returns true if the status of the accountLinkingPolicy for the accountStoreHolder is ENABLED, false otherwise
      boolean isAutomaticProvisioningEnabled()
      Returns true if the automaticProvisioningStatus of the accountLinkingPolicy for the accountStoreHolder is ENABLED, false otherwise
      AccountLinkingPolicy setAutomaticProvisioning(AutomaticProvisioningStatus automaticProvisioningStatus)
      Sets the automaticProvisioningStatus of the accountLinkingPolicy for the accountStoreHolder.
      AccountLinkingPolicy setMatchingProperty(String matchingProperty)
      Sets the the matchingProperty of the accountLinkingPolicy for the accountStoreHolder.
      AccountLinkingPolicy setStatus(AccountLinkingStatus status)
      Sets the status of the accountLinkingPolicy for the accountStoreHolder.
